summary: Miniature orcs with little armor and a regular iron mace.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds 2 new npc called \"Goblin\" and \"Hobgoblin\"
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8ubZX.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RdgY2.png[/IMG]
It is simply a male orc with height of 0.60, wearing pants only and carrying a mace.
I used bandit AI template, but haven\'t added any spawning info.
Use the console commands to spawn goblins next to you.
[i]help Goblin
player.placeatme XXXXXXXX 1[/i]
Where [i]XXXXXXXX [/i] is the ID of the Goblin NPC
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pGYiy.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uAHGQ.jpg[/IMG]

Read more about the project - http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/559910-more-magical-monsters-please/

New in 1.1:
- Hobgoblins! They feature the extensive upgrade of having a leather helmet! Also they are 40% faster than the regular goblins.
- Both Goblins and Hobgoblins are slimmer
author: itzkin
